Site for student written articles about Shenango School District

div.p: In order to effectively get communication from your teachers, you need to be sure you have StudentSquare installed and working on your phone. An email was sent recently to any student not currently signed up. Use the link in the email to setup your account. It is recommended you enable all notifications, especially while school is closed and you are working from
Helpful links to sites for students are below:
